channel.title: These Games I Love (Part One)
channel.description: This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/these-games-i-love-part-one

item.title: These Games I Love (Part One)
item.dc:creator: @Deckard
item.description:
@Deckard wrote:

If you haven’t read this and you had tough school years, I am sure you can relate to this entry. It’s a great blog entry! My first rpg was also Marvel Super Heroes with my best (and only friend) when I moved states in middle school. The stories he told using this system were ridiculous and AMAZING! It almost makes me nostalgic for middle school nowadays. I have forgotten nearly all of the little shits that gave new kids a hard time. Instead, my mind takes me back frequently to all those free weekends full of stories through rpgs with a great friend.

Read full topic
